summary_comment: Professor Douce is an outstanding teacher known for his expertise and dedication, consistently providing valuable information and support to his students. His passion for the subject matter is evident and greatly enhances the learning experience.
summary_comment_short: Professor Douce is an outstanding teacher known for his expertise and dedication, always ready to assist students and deliver invaluable information. His passion for the subject matter is evident and enhances the learning experience significantly.

Ratings.comment: An excellent teacher, great at what he does, always willing to help and a pleasure to be around
